
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/Can-daydayup/p/19014041" title="发布于 2025-07-31 08:00">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">一款实用的 Visual Studio 发布部署插件，助力提高部署效率！</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>前言</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>在日常工作中，项目的发布与部署往往是一个既繁琐又耗时的环节。今天大姚给大家分享一款实用的 Visual Studio 发布部署插件，帮助大家提高部署效率：AntDeploy。</span></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>插件介绍</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>AntDeploy 是一款由 .NET 开源、实用的 Visual Studio 发布部署插件，支持部署 Docker、IIS、Windows 和 Linux 服务，同时支持 .NET Framework 和 .NET Core，支持回滚和增量部署，在支持 Visual Studio 2019 和 2022 中使用。</span></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250730211414705-846768764.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>插件功能说明</span></h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><span>支持 Docker 一键部署(支持.NET Core)</span></li>
<li><span>支持 IIS 一键部署(支持.NET Core 和 .NET Framework)</span></li>
<li><span>支持 Windows 服务一键部署(支持 .NET Core 和 .NET Framework)</span></li>
<li><span>支持 Linux 服务一键部署(支持.NET Core)</span></li>
<li><span>支持增量发布、支持一键回滚、支持选择特定文件发布、支持查看发布记录等</span></li>
<li><span>支持脱离 Visual Studio 独立使用（跨平台支持 Windows 系统和 Mac 系统）</span></li>
<li><span>等等等...</span></li>
</ul>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>功能实现流程</span></h2>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250730211434231-244722796.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250730211440260-1968660098.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250730211447988-1976705303.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>插件源代码</span></h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><strong>插件开源地址：</strong>&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><strong><a href="https://github.com/yuzd/AntDeploy" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/yuzd/AntDeploy</span></a></strong></span></li>
<li><strong>插件市场地址：</strong>&nbsp;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><strong><a href="https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=nainaigu.AntDeploy" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=nainaigu.AntDeploy</span></a></strong></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250730211526611-1390574581.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器">发布效果图</h2>
<h3 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>IIS发布效果</span></h3>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250730211543788-1744295479.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250730211548739-1796350423.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<h3>Docker发布效果</h3>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250730211605521-877765342.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<h3>Mac电脑使用效果</h3>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202507/1336199-20250730211622943-1261611864.png" alt="image" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>更多 Visual Studio 实用功能</span></h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><strong><a href="https://github.com/YSGStudyHards/DotNetGuide" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/YSGStudyHards/DotNetGuide</span></a></strong></span></li>
